channel.title: Petr Ruzicka
channel.description: Jak pěstovat sílu, rovnováhu i mobilitu, jak uzdravit tělo a jak se lépe hýbat. Pohyb, cvičení a tréning (nejen) s vlastní vahou, ale se vším, co dává smysl, člověka to rozvíjí a hlavně je to zábava.

item.title: Optimal nutrition
item.description: Unless you live in a cave, you are constantely being told what you should eat, how many spoons of what is neccessary to take every day. What not to eat. What to eat in the morning what in the evening. How healthy it is to fast. How healthy it is to eat regularly. That it is good to skip breakfast. It’s chaos. I don’t want to tell you about what I eat for breakfast or what is right. What´s “right” might be a completely different thing.

item.title: Tipy z Batcave
item.description: Už dlouho jsem nenapsal žádný delší článek na blog a důvod je ten, že píšu každý den na Facebook. Proč ?

item.title: From 0 to 60 in 11 months
item.description: In a hand-balancer’s training there is one important milestone - when you can stand on your hands without support and any considerable movement for 60 seconds. This article describes my journey to a 60-second handstand.

item.title: Position of hands in handstand
item.description: Position of hands in a handstand is quite important. Where and how are hands placed on the floor logically affects how the handstand will look like. So, in what way should we place our hands on the floor? And where? And why? The following text is for beginners who don’t know how to do it. Advanced learners know the story all right.

item.title: 101 Reasons To Do Handstand
item.description: Why should we stand on hands? Why do a handstand? What are the advantages of a handstand? This article mentions only some of them.
